statements: SELECT * FROM employee_payroll;
SELECT employee_name, salary FROM employee_payroll WHERE salary > 50000;
SELECT * FROM employee_payroll WHERE bonuses < 2000;
SELECT employee_id, employee_name, salary FROM employee_payroll ORDER BY salary DESC;
SELECT * FROM employee_payroll WHERE deductions > 1000 AND bonuses < 3000;
SELECT * FROM employee_payroll WHERE salary > 50000;
SELECT employee_name, deductions FROM employee_payroll WHERE deductions >= 1000 ORDER BY employee_name DESC;
SELECT employee_id, employee_name, salary - deductions + bonuses AS total_pay FROM employee_payroll WHERE salary BETWEEN 40000 AND 60000 ORDER BY total_pay DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT employee_name, bonuses FROM employee_payroll WHERE bonuses > 2000 ORDER BY bonuses, employee_name ASC;
SELECT employee_name, salary, deductions, bonuses, salary + deductions - bonuses AS net_salary FROM employee_payroll WHERE salary < 70000 ORDER BY net_salary DESC;
SELECT * FROM employees
SELECT first_name, last_name, salary FROM employees ORDER BY salary DESC
SELECT first_name, last_name, salary, deductions FROM employees WHERE salary > 50000
SELECT * FROM employees WHERE deductions < 1000
SELECT employee_id, first_name, last_name, total_salary FROM employees INNER JOIN payroll ON employees.employee_id = payroll.employee_id
SELECT * FROM employees ORDER BY salary DESC;
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM employees WHERE deductions > bonuses;
SELECT employee_id, first_name, last_name, salary - (deductions + bonuses) AS net_salary FROM employees WHERE salary > 5000;
SELECT employee_id, first_name, last_name, total_salary FROM employees INNER JOIN payroll ON employees.employee_id = payroll.employee_id;
SELECT * FROM employees WHERE first_name LIKE 'M%' AND last_name LIKE '%son';
SELECT * FROM employee_payroll;
SELECT employee_name, salary FROM employee_payroll WHERE salary > 50000;
SELECT employee_id, employee_name, salary, (salary - deductions) AS net_salary FROM employee_payroll WHERE bonuses > 1000;
SELECT employee_name, SUM(amount) AS total_deductions FROM deductions GROUP BY employee_name;
SELECT employee_name, bonus_type, amount FROM bonuses ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM employee_payroll WHERE salary > 50000;
SELECT employee_id, employee_name, deductions, deductions.amount FROM employee_payroll JOIN deductions ON employee_payroll.employee_id = deductions.employee_id;
SELECT employee_name, salary, bonus_type, bonuses.amount FROM employee_payroll JOIN bonuses ON employee_payroll.employee_id = bonuses.employee_id WHERE bonuses.amount > 1000;
SELECT employee_id, SUM(deductions.amount) AS total_deductions FROM employee_payroll JOIN deductions ON employee_payroll.employee_id = deductions.employee_id GROUP BY employee_id;
SELECT employee_name, salary, (salary - (deductions + bonuses)) AS net_pay FROM employee_payroll ORDER BY net_pay DESC;
SELECT * FROM employees;
SELECT employee_id, name FROM employees WHERE department = 'HR';
SELECT name, salary FROM employees ORDER BY salary DESC;
SELECT * FROM bonuses WHERE bonus_amount > 1000;
SELECT department_name, COUNT(employee_id) AS employee_count FROM employees JOIN departments ON employees.department = departments.department_name GROUP BY department_name;
SELECT * FROM employees WHERE department = 'IT';
SELECT name, salary FROM employees WHERE salary > 50000 ORDER BY salary DESC;

SELECT e.name, p.total_salary, b.bonus_amount FROM employees e JOIN payroll_information p ON e.employee_id = p.employee_id JOIN bonuses b ON e.employee_id = b.employee_id WHERE p.pay_date = '2022-01-31';
SELECT d.department_name, COUNT(*) AS total_employees FROM employees e JOIN departments d ON e.department = d.department_name GROUP BY d.department_name;
SELECT e.name, SUM(p.total_salary) AS total_salary FROM employees e JOIN payroll_information p ON e.employee_id = p.employee_id WHERE e.department = 'HR' GROUP BY e.name ORDER BY total_salary DESC;
SELECT full_name, hire_date FROM employees;
SELECT department_name FROM departments;
SELECT position_name, base_salary FROM positions ORDER BY base_salary DESC;
SELECT * FROM salaries WHERE salary > 5000;
SELECT employee_id, bonus_amount, bonus_reason FROM bonuses ORDER BY bonus_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM employees;
SELECT full_name, hire_date, salary, deductions FROM employees WHERE salary > 50000;
SELECT department_name, COUNT(employee_id) AS num_employees FROM employees JOIN departments ON employees.employee_id = departments.department_id GROUP BY department_name;

SELECT full_name, base_salary, base_salary + (SELECT IFNULL(bonus_amount, 0) FROM bonuses WHERE bonuses.employee_id = employees.employee_id) AS total_salary FROM employees JOIN positions ON employees.employee_id = positions.position_id;
SELECT full_name, bonus_amount, bonus_reason FROM employees LEFT JOIN bonuses ON employees.employee_id = bonuses.employee_id WHERE bonus_reason LIKE '%recognition%';
